question:
Which of the following matches of X and Y are correct?
    X                                    Y
Part II      -          Directive Principles of State Policy
Part III    -           Fundamental Rights
Part IV     -          Citizenship
Part IV A -           Fundamental Duties
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Part II of the Constitution of India deals with Citizenship and Part IV of the Constitution deals with Directive Principles of State Policy. Part III contains Fundamental Rights and Part IVA contains Fundamental Duties.
